text.text_translated:
Os Gêmeos are twin brothers and they look the same.  
They are from São Paulo.  
They paint tags.  
They also paint big bright pictures of people on building sides.  
Their work is big, so they need cranes to lift them.  
In 2007 they painted a whole castle in Scotland.
